faqs.question: Are your products cruelty-free?
faqs.answer: Yes, all of our products are 100% cruelty-free and never tested on animals.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: We currently ship worldwide. Delivery times may vary depending on your location.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: If you are not satisfied, you can return products within 30 days for a full refund.

faqs.question: Are the ingredients safe for sensitive skin?
faqs.answer: Yes, our formulas are dermatologically tested and suitable for most skin types.

brand.name: GlowSkin Naturals
brand.description: Premium, cruelty-free skincare made with love and pure ingredients.

about.title: Our Story
paragraphs: At LuxSkin, we believe beauty should be pure, simple, and empowering. Our journey began with a mission to craft skincare products that combine natural ingredients with modern science.
Every product is cruelty-free, eco-conscious, and made to bring out your natural glow. More than skincare, LuxSkin is a lifestyle â€” embracing self-care with luxury you can trust.
